Class Ecommerce.Customer

java.lang.Object
Ecommerce.People
Ecommerce.Customer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ecommerce.Employee
Enclosing class:
Ecommerce
public class Ecommerce.Customer
extends Ecommerce.People
Customer is a class that rappresents a generic Customer of the shop. It is a subclass of People and it is extended by the class Employee. Every Customer has a cart and an orders list, like in every ecommerce ever.
See Also:
Ecommerce.People, Ecommerce.Employee

    • addToCart

      public void addToCart​(Ecommerce.Wine wine, int quantity)
      adds to cart a selected Wine with the selected quantity. Warns the Customer in case the desired quantity is unavailable.
      Parameters:
      wine - the wine the customer wants to buy. [Wine]
      quantity - the quantity of the selected Wine. [int]
      See Also:
      Ecommerce.Wine

    • removeFromCart

      public void removeFromCart​(Ecommerce.Wine wine)
      Removes the selected wine from the cart.
      Parameters:
      wine - the wine the customer wants to remove from the cart. [Wine]

    • isAuth

      public boolean isAuth()

    • toggleAuth

      public void toggleAuth()

    • buy

      public void buy()
      Buys everything that has been added from the cart. If the quantity in the cart is greater than the one in stock, the customer will be automatically added to the notification squad for the wine in question.
